name: fubsy
content:

rather short and fat: The actor plays the fubsy assistant store manager with surprising firearm skills. Synonyms
dumpy
squat
More examplesFewer examplesShe sat at the piano and played for the benefit of the fubsy men.His pet name for Louise was Fubsy meaning plump, for her well-rounded figure.He patted his foolish fubsy old dog. When she flung open the door, she found herself confronted, not by the fubsy Mr. Shirley, but by the very man she'd dreamed of meeting.There he was, and his fat fubsy wife too.
